original_text: And he built the city all around from the Millo in complete circuit, and Joab repaired the rest of the city.
korean_text: 다윗이 밀로에서부터 두루 성을 쌓았고 그 성의 나머지는 요압이 중수하였더라

sentences.original_text: And he built the city all around from the Millo in complete circuit
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 밀로에서부터 시작하여 성을 온전히 둘러 건축하고

sentences.original_text: and Joab repaired the rest of the city.
